Our two brave birds are on the wildest adventure ever.

Pete and Pat are not the best of flyers and they have both decided to go wild and launch themselves from a cannon to see who can make the longest journey.
Along their travels they will face many challenges to make your adventure competitive but always fun.
But do not worry, for help is always on the way.

You can get points and earn money to upgrade your bird and your cannon.
Enhancing your bird will change the way you fly and help you reach long distances.
It is very important to choose the right things for you in order to make your bird fly for longer.
Upgrading your cannon will also help you to fire your bird with extra power and defeat the power of gravity.

Adventures of Pete and Pat is a unique game which will bring hours of fun to all the family.
Be Warned!!! Game can become extremely addictive.

WHY BUY THE FULL VERSION:
- No annoying prompts
- No annoying Ads
- Faster gameplay

- New birds coming soon, which is your favourite?
- New adventures coming soon too

Features:
- Cute bird graphics and animations
- Play in different time zones with different sound effects, including haunting nights
- Choose Pete the male bird or Pat the female bird (both just as cute)
- Never has flying a bird been so much fun and entertaining
- Upgrade your bird to fly according to your flying style
- Upgrade your cannon to increase the fire power
- Aim with your cannon at the right angles and reach new lengths
- Unique gaming experience
- Very easy to play
- Great fun for all the family
- Compete with others in the Leaderboards

Control:
Touch the cannon red icon to fire your bird into the sky
Simply just touch any of the buttons to perform that special ability

Note:
Please note that bird will start very slow at first.
You need to earn money and upgrade your bird and cannon to increase performance.
You will then fly fast and according to your style.
